info.description: Taxrates.io API - the successfully streamlined tax rates monitoring process. Use 'Expand operation' link on the right to see details. Start with authentication: get your token and generate authorization string. We recommend using Postman when discovering our API. Happy using!

license.name: Private licence - only for using by authorized Members of taxrates.io

info.title: Taxrates.io

get.description: This the very first URL you must hit when you want to use taxrates.io API. When you got your Client ID key and Client Secret key you are able to use our API resources.

parameters.description: Domain name: api.taxrates.io
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: Your Client ID goes here. Check the dashboard if you do not know your Client ID.
parameters.name: clientid

parameters.description: Your Client Secret key goes here. Check the dashboard if you do not know your Client Secret key.
parameters.name: clientsecret

parameters.description: You have to use api_member as a scope.
parameters.name: clientscope

200.description: Success. JSON formatted string in return.

valid_to.description: The date until your token is valid

get.description: This is the second endpoint you have to hit. When you got your token here you can generate your Bearer authorization header. The header will be used to authorize every API call.

parameters.description: Domain name: api.taxrates.io
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: The token you got from <<token>> endpoint
parameters.name: token

parameters.description: You have to use api_member as a scope.
parameters.name: clientscope

200.description: Success. JSON formatted authorization string in return.

Authorization.description: Bearer: __Your authorization key will appear here__

404.description: No valid token found You have to call <<token>> endpoint to get/refresh your token first.

get.description: This method returns all tax rates configured on Member's account using cursor. Use X-Cursor-Next header to recursively read all rates. Max limit is 500 records per request.

parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Cursor shows from which record you want to get information. Default value is 0, next value can be retrieved from X-Cursor-Next header.
parameters.name: cursor

200.description: An array of locations with tax rates
